definitions.definition: Any of a class of aromatic heterocyclic compounds containing a ring of four carbon atoms and a nitrogen atom; especially the simplest one, C 4 H 5 N.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) Any of a class of aromatic heterocyclic compounds containing a ring of four carbon atoms and a nitrogen atom; especially the simplest one, C 4 H 5 N. [from 19th c.]
